ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 30
ygData.msgSnippet: I have gotten most of my skill now from making bows beyond the 185 mark...... Vapn, Master Fletcher, Povar ... From: Cooper, Mark
ygData.messageBody:
I have gotten most of my skill now from making bows beyond the 185
mark......

Vapn, Master Fletcher, Povar

-----Original Message-----
From: Cooper, Mark [mailto:blackhawk@...]
Sent: Saturday, October 02, 1999 12:06 PM
To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] Digest Number 30


From: blackhawk@... (Cooper, Mark)

I WANT TO CRY.. I LVL 182 AND HAVE FAILED 2 TIMES ON
DARWOOD AND 2 CAM AND SILK AND PLAINING TOOL.

BE WARNED.

BROKE AND BEWILDERED
KARVAR BLACKHAWK

PS. BLADED NOW TRIVIAL TO ME .. WHAT SHOULDI USE TO IMPROVE MY SKILL NOW? IT
IS
THE MOST EXPENSIVE ARROW ITEM AND IT IS TRIVIAL. THE STEEL SHAFT DOES NOT
SAY
TRIVIAL BUST 80 TRYS HAS RESULTED IN NO SKILL POINTS. SO I CONFUSED NOW
PLEASE HELP.

Bonecrkr wrote:

> From: "Bonecrkr" <bonecrkr@...>
>
> Well, here's a tidbit about making bows that I discovered the hard way (by
> trying it out). At skill 170, bows made with Oak, a plane, silk, and 1
cam,
> are trivial. I suspect that the 2 cam is also but I haven't tried it (had
a
> customer ask for the 1 cam). Anyone have any idea when (or IF) darkwood
> becomes trivial? Man, would I laugh hard if I threw a darkwood in with 2
> cams, some silk and a planing tool and get the trivial message (yeah, I
> know, I'm dreaming). Anyone have any experience with this? Anyone had
any
> spectacular failures working with Darkwood? Anyone know how (or if) cams
> and planing tools increase the level needed to make a bow (or at which it
is
> trivial)? How about pricing? I've been selling the basic Rough Oak
recurve
> bow (hemp string) for 150pp and have sold quite a few. I sold one 1-cam
Oak
> recurve for 200pp. Am I charging too little? Too much? What would you
> sell a darkwood for?
>
>
